title: Remember Devourer?
body: And the tiny little wolf dog you'd get? :(

replies.body: TBH the scuttle changes are awful in general. It forces more early game champions like Kha or vi (although Kha has an awful clear) and basically fucks high mana clearers. {{champion:64}} meta :(
Hopefully the changes to {{item:1039}} and {{item:1414}} are actually good for mana users. I'm not going to hold my breath, though.

I'm just afraid of seeing crappy Lees and Khazix's in my game who only pick them up to abuse meta then don't know any mechanics. I stopped playing Jungle after the countless changes since S6-7 and now this. It's almost like they're trying to enforce a jungle meta, where the 'better' jungler gets botlane ahead and stomps the enemy team. XP is so important in the JG, 1 level usually means you lose vs the enemy jungler in a duel or 2v2
{{champion:203}} has a doggo, not so smol tho
Used to build it on {{champion:54}} and go full tank, damn broken lol
Yeah. It was so fun playing against a Yi that could build full tank and kill you in 2 seconds with 90% true damage.

Honestly that was because of people realizing items like old {{item:3124}} and {{item:3053}} being broken when combined with Yi and Sated, not because of Sated itself. Before that three item combo was found, Yi generally built full glass, and nowadays, his build is _mostly_ still glass, aside from maybe the {{item:3022}} (and sometimes {{item:3026}}).
Devourer was my favorite item, but Riot removed it because 'farming = bad'.

> [{quoted}](name=Pokemonred200,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A4QKtPkw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-04-29T01:55:33.016+0000)
>
> Devourer was my favorite item, but Riot removed it because 'farming = bad'.

It was a bit more than just farming.  With devourer I was 1 v 5 people with the old WW.  25+ kills a game with maybe like 4-5 deaths.  It was a bit insane although delayed as you pretty much stayed in jungle until sated.  So you could be winning the game and suddenly a sated jungler comes out and rolls the whole team for the win.  I do not think it should have been nuked quite so hard though.  I liked melee sustain champs, which pretty much do not even exist anymore.  It is all about burst kills in 1 second.

While it may not have been _just_ farming, that was apparently their primary reasoning, since "the primary problem with 'farming junglers' is that you don't see them for half the game." -> Their exact words, as per patch 6.9:

>While Devourer is an incremental improvement over past incarnations (shout-outs to those who remember Feral Flare’s insane healing and vision control), the primary problem with ‘farming junglers’ is that you don’t see them for half the game. Junglers are an integral part of how teams in League operate, and incentivizing them to AFK for the 15 minutes is too high a cost to be healthy long-term. We still want to support junglers that like high attack speed and on-hit builds, but this isn’t the way to do it.

I personally feel like the concept could have been balanced, but the double on-hit passive made sated too good when on-hit builds allowed for offtanks. Maybe what could've happened was giving it another passive, while moving Phantom Hit to {{item:3124}} like they did. But who knows; it's in the past now.

yea i remember that item that made  it hell on earth if you played against shyvana


... or if you ever saw your jungler pre 30 mins
Man, I think I started playing after this item got taken off. Shyvana was my main when I used to be a jungler.

I rememember playing Shyvana and invading the enemy Yi to high hell until I had sated, which happened at 8 minutes.

That Yi had 5 stacks by 20 minutes. IIRC he ragequit :D
If it still existed today you could play Janna and take Aery, and have three little pets floating around with you. :(
